inn1.comm: moves forward and drives firmly to mid-off.
back of a length delivery and on line, Tamim defends it down on the track.
moves forward and opens the face of the bat to a delivery outside the off stump and steers it down to thirdman and gets off the mark.
good forward step and defends with the full face off the bat to the off side.
fuller delivery from Gul and Tamim does well to drive it along the ground past the bowler to the long off fence.
shorter in length this time from Gul and Nafees behind it defends it along the track.
starts off with fuller delivery down the leg side.
good ball from Tanvir, keeps it full and Tamim gets into a tangle and falls on the track as he blocks the ball.
full delivery and Tamim neatly plays it through midwicket to the fence, good shot.
good ball coming in, Tamim defends on the front foot to mid-off.
beats the bat this time as he pitches short of a length and moving away.
good ball once again, gets a thickish edge as he drives to mid-on.
short in length and Tamim tucks it around through square leg for a single.
flicks to midwicket, Nasir picks up the ball and strikes the stumps at the non-strikers end.
pushes to the off side to cover.
short in length and Tamim drives off the back foot to Afridi at cover.
oversteps this time, pitches back of a length and Tamim plays to the off side.
lovely shot, makes room and hits it well past the short extra cover to the fence.
digs in a short one and Tamim ducks under it.
turns it around to square leg and looks for a single, the throw just misses the stumps.
fuller delivery outside the off stump, driven to mid-off.
drifts onto the pads and Nafees fails to get some bat, takes the pad and to the onside.
once again drifts onto the pads and Nafees not finding his touch misses it.
hint of away swing as Nafees pushes to mid-off.
good tight delivery on line from Tanvir, pushes to the onside.
way down the leg side and signaled a wide.
caught! First strike for Tanvir and Pakistan, action replay to the first ODI, when he got out. It was wide outside the off stump and Nafees cuts, gets the edge through to Akmal behind the stumps.
good drive on the up through covers to the fence, good shot.
back of a length delivery and Tamim defends to the off side.
moves forward to a good length delivery and defends to cover.
oversteps and Gul strays down the leg side, Tamim gets good tickle down to fine leg fence.
short ball and Tamim hits in the air to mid-on, where Yousuf takes the catch but it was a free hit and he cannot be out, they take a single.
good leave by Aftab as it pitches in the corridor outside the off stump.
another good delivery, pitches short of a length outside the off stump and comes in, Aftab watches it closely and lets it go through to Akmal.
good length delivery and the ball stops on the batsman as he pushes in the air and on the bounce to mid-off.
bit wide and moves further away after pitching, left alone through to Akmal.
another wayward delivery down the leg side.
one more down the leg side and umpire Bucknor signals a wide.
coming into Tamim, who works it around behind square leg to the deep for a single.
short of a length angled across, Aftab lets it go.
bad shout for a lbw as the ball pitches way outside the leg stump and strikes the pad.
good length delivery angled across, left alone through to Akmal.
pushes to mid-on.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
dropped! Flicks it in the air in front of square leg and Nasir Jamshed dives to take the catch but the ball wobbles out of his palm.
short of a length delivery defended to the off side.
good nasty delivery to finish the over as it surprises Tamim, he jumps up and drops his wrist down to leave the ball. The ball actually takes the shoulder.
defended back to the bowler.
comes forward and defends to cover.
Short delivery and Aftab mistimes the hook down to fine leg, the ball falls safely.
defended to the onside.
slower delivery and Tamim pushes to the off side.

Gul strikes, pitches short of a length and coming in, strikes the pad bit high as Aftab comes forward, loud appeal and umpire Dar raises his finger. Aftab might be unlucky as the ball hit him bit high on the pad.
plays it behind square leg for a single.
good short and sharp delivery, Tamim lets it go.
tucks it through midwicket for couple of runs.
good shot from Tamim as he punches off the back foot through extra cover to the fence. The fielder had got some hand on it but the ball had the legs to carry on to the fence.
fuller delivery played to the onside.
full length delivery outside the off stump and Ashraful puts his left foot forward and drives through the line to extra cover fence, lovely shot.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
good delivery angled across and Ashraful lets it go.
plays to the onside.
mistimes the drive to the off side.
good length delivery angled across, lets it go.
driven to the off side for a single.
short ball and Ashraful quickly onto the back foot pulls well to the midwicket fence.
moves inside the line and looks to play it behind the keeper, too early to play such a shot when he can play well in front of the wicket.
there you go, a gorgeous shot as he puts his left foot forward and drives all along the ground in the gap through extra cover to the fence.
short delivery and Ashraful is upto to it pulls well high in the air in front of square leg for another boundary, third one in the over.
good sharp bouncer and Ashraful gets under it.
back of a length delivery and Tamim mistimes the drive to mid-on.
bit wide outside the off stump and Tamim drives on the up to extra cover and Younis Khan does well to stop the ball.
slower delivery which goes wrong for Tanvir, down the leg side.
on the legs and Tamim works it behind square leg to the deep.
driven on the up back down the track and Tanvir gets some hand on it as the ball strikes the stumps at the non-strikers end, Ashraful's bat was well grounded in the crease.
slower delivery and Tamim does not pick it up, too early into the shot and the ball skews behind the wicket to the onside and they go through for a single.
good ball right in the block-hole, dug out by Ashraful.
drives to mid-off.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
moves forward and pushes to extra cover, unable to find the gap.
good slower delivery bit short in length and Tamim looking to run it down, misses it.
moves forward and defends with an angled bat behind point.
drives to mid-off, that ends a good tidy first over from Iftikhar.
good ball coming in, defended to the onside.
good length delivery coming in, strikes the pad as Ashraful plays foward. The ball strikes just outside the line.
fuller delivery and Ashraful drives to mid-off.
a cheeky shot, short delivery and Ashraful cuts it over the keeper to the fence, well played.
full toss driven to mid-off.
flicks it to midwicket and Younis Khan dives, makes a good save.
plays it to square leg, good tight stuff from Iftikhar as he rolls his fingers over the ball.
pushes on the front foot to the off side.
opens the face off the bat and plays behind point.
moves forward and drives to extra cover.
good shot, moves forward and drives well down the track past the bowler to long on boundary.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to thirdman for a single.
plays it back to the bowler.
gets a leading edge to the off side.
short ball pulled away on the back foot to deep-midwicket.
gives himself some room and cuts, misses it.
tosses it bit full, drives it back to the bowler.
driven down the ground with the full face off the bat to long off.
moves forward and drives to mid-on.
good length delivery coming in and strikes the pad in line as Ashraful plays forward, a loud appeal and Dar raises his finger. Iftikhar picks up Ashraful.
defended to the off side.
drives on the front foot to the off side.
running his fingers over the seam, coming slower, defends to the off side.
nice firm drive to extra cover but cannot get it through.
tosses it full, driven to mid-off.
moves forward and works to midwicket.
quicker delivery and Tamim cuts to short thirdman.
driven to mid-off.
moves forward and defends.
down the wicket and hits it well in the air over extra cover to the fence, good footwork.
moves forward and drives to mid-on.
short delivery defended to the onside.
back of a length delivery defended to the off side.
driven on the up to point.
back of a length delivery defended to the off side.
back of a length delivery worked behind square leg for couple of runs.
down the track and hits it in the air over midwicket to the deep, was not timed well.
defended to the off side.
pitches in line and goes on, strikes the pad, was a good shout, turned down.
works it behind square leg for a single.
once again worked behind square leg for another single.
good ball comes forward and defends on the track.
moves forward and drives on the up to the sweeper cover for a single.
swings and misses as the ball is angled across.
quick single taken as the ball is pushed to mid-off.
looking to steer it down, on the bounce to Akmal.
good stroke from Tamim, flicks it through midwicket and the ball races along the ground as Yousuf chases in vain.
smashed down the ground to the long on boundary, good shot, brings up his 50!
Afridi strikes, pitches in line with the stumps and Shakib Al Hassan plays across the line and misses, the ball strikes the pad, loud appeal, Bucknor takes his time and raises his finger.
moves forward and drives through cover for a single, gets off the mark.
works it behind square leg for a single.
quicker delivery defended to the onside.
plays it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
quicker delivery outside the off stump, drives and misses.
oversteps, plays square of the wicket on the off side.
down the track and hits it handsomely high in the air and in the gap to midwicket fence.
moves forward and drives with the full face off the bat down the ground to long off.
works it to the onside.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
works it square of the wicket on the onside.
defended on the front foot to the onside.
this time Afridi oversteps, driven back to him.
down the wicket and hits it high in the air to the off side, Malik lets it drop and takes it on the bounce as it was a free hit.
comes down the track and drives to long on.
plays with an angled bat to the off side.

caught! Tosses it up and Tamim comes down the wicket and mishits it in the air down the ground to long off, Umar Gul takes a good catch above his head. An unnecessary shot by Tamim, who was striking the ball well.
quicker delivery, gets an edge down to fine leg.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
comes forward and pushes to cover for a single.
driven down the ground to long on.
comes forward and  defends to the off side.
punches off the back foot to midwicket.
moves forward and pushes it back to the bowler.
defended to the off side.
once again defended to the off side.
defended to the onside.
tosses it up bit slower and Reza takes it on the full and flicks it through midwicket to the fence.
works it behind the wicket on the onside to the deep for couple of runs.
works it through midwicket, coming back for the second run, the throw is bit wild and wide.
plays it behind the wicket on the onside.
defended to the off side.
down the wicket and hits it well over the bowler, high and over the fence for maximum, good strike.
pushes down the ground to long on.
defended to the onside.
spins down the leg side.
moves forward and defends to the off side.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
lets it go as the ball spins away outside the off stump.
quicker delivery, gets an edge behind the wicket.
full toss driven down the ground to long off.
defended to the off side.
defended once again to the off side.
played to the onside.
plays it square of the wicket on the onside.
turns it around behind square leg.
defended to the off side.
punches off the back foot to mid-off.
moves forward and pushes to cover.
plays to the onside, Afridi quickly onto the ball.
driven through covers for a single.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket on the off side.
down the wicket and drives down the ground to long on.
stands in the crease and defends back to the bowler.
tosses it up nicely and defended on the track.
down the wicket and hits inside-out high in the air to extra cover fence, good footwork.
short ball and Reza misses the pull shot.
down the track and takes it on the full, driven down the ground to long off.
short ball cut away to deep-point for a single.
pushes to cover, looking for a single.
quicker delivery, punched wide of the fielder at mid-off.
down the track and hits very hard along the ground to long off.
plays to the off side for a single.
loud shout for lbw as the ball strikes the pad, turned down by umpire Bucknor.
blocked to the onside.
off the pad to the off side.
waits in the crease and plays to the onside.
looking to drive in front of the wicket on the off side but the ball skews off the outside edge to backward point fence.
spins down the leg side and the Akmal misses a good stumping chance as the batsman came down the track.
defended back to the bowler.

Afridi strikes just after the drinks break, quicker delivery strikes the pad in line as Reza plays forward, Bucknor ponders hard, nodes his head and then raises his finger. Afridi picks up his third wicket.
good tight stuff from Afridi, defended back down the track.
comes forward and defends square of the wicket on the off side.
moves forward and plays square of the wicket to the off side.
off the pad to the off side.
spins down the leg side, signaled a wide.
shorter in length defended back to the bowler.
off the pad to the on side.
spins down the leg side, Akmal is unable to gather it, goes to the fence, signaled as wides.
plays behind the wicket on the onside.
defended to the off side.
pushes to the onside.
comes forward and defends on the track.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
short delivery outside the off stump, Mahmudullah plays through covers for a single.
cuts to point.
digs in a short delivery and Dhiman Ghosh ducks under it.
chops it hard into the ground and through the in-field to the deep.
oversteps, outside edge past the slip to thirdman fence.
gets a boundary on the free hit, makes room, looking to cut through the off side, gets the edge high in the air down to fine leg fence.
driven down the ground to long off.
played behind square leg for a single.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
comes forward, off the pad to the off side.
plays to square leg.
looking to punch it through the off side, gets a thickish edge back to the bowler.
defended to the off side.
sweeps it around to fine leg for couple of runs.
once again sweeps to fine leg.
turns it around behind square leg for a single.
short ball and Dhiman Ghosh pulls well through midwicket to the fence, a terrible delivery from Younis Khan
works through midwicket for a single.
punches off the back foot to wide long off for couple of runs.
moves across his stumps and sweeps, off the pad to short thirdman.
plays square of the wicket on the off side for a single.
defended to the onside.
sweeps from outside the off stump to fine leg.
off the pad to the onside.
works it square of the wicket on the onside for a single.
plays it once again behind square leg to pick up a single.
plays square of the wicket on the off side.
driven down the ground to long on.
comes forward and plays to point.
lovely delivery pitches on the off stump and spins across the face off the bat.
pulled around behind square leg to the deep.
plays and misses outside the off stump.
off the pad to the onside.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
down the wicket and plays to wide long on.
waits for the turn and works it to square leg.
plays and misses down the leg side, not signaled a wide this time.
works it to deep-midwicket for a single.
works it nicely to the vacant midwicket for a single as Younis Khan jogs to retrieve the ball.
cuts it through point to the deep for couple of runs.
plays to the onside to the vacant onside, looking for the second run but Umar Gul is quickly onto the ball.
works it to short fine leg.
pushes down the ground to long on for a single.
short delivery played with an angled bat to backward point, Butt has a shy at the stumps, was a long way off.
driven to the off side to mid-off.
good ball in the block-hole, dug out to the off side.
punches it back to the bowler.
works it through midwicket to the deep.
short of a length delivery, blocked to the off side.
defended to the off side.
played through covers to the deep.
plays behind the wicket to the off side.
pulls and gets an outside edge behind the wicket.
works it through the vacant midwicket to the deep for couple of runs.
works it behind square leg for a single.
plays it square of the wicket on the off side.
misfield at midwicket as Mahmudullah works it to the onside.
short in length and into the batsman, cramps him for room, plays it back to the bowler.
yorker dug out back to the bowler.
turns it around to fine leg for a single.
tucks it through square leg to the deep for a single, brings up the 200 for Bangladesh.
plays it down to thirdman for a single.
full toss driven down the ground to long off.
lovely shot from Mahumudullah, driven on the up in the gap through extra cover to the fence.
bad delivery by Tanvir, full and on the legs, tickles it to fine leg fence, brings up his maiden half-century.
played to the off side for a single.
full toss driven to mid-on.
short ball mistimed to the onside.
pushes it back down the track and Iftikhar misfields to allow the single.
full delivery driven down the ground to long on.
full and wide outside the off stump, slices it in the air to thirdman.

short ball and Dhiman Ghosh mishits it high in the air and down the ground to long on, Nasir Jamshed runs forward and the ball pops out on the first attempt and then he reacts well to take it on the second attempt.
digs in a short one, which goes way over the batsman, signaled a wide.
nice shot, moves forward and drives well in the gap between extra cover and mid-off to the fence, he has played that shot well today.
pushes to extra cover and the non-striker takes off for a single, the throw from Shoaib Malik misses the stumps,  a run out missed.
swings at a slower delivery and misses.
waist high full toss, Bucknor says it is fine, played square of the wicket on the off side.
defended to the off side.
off the pad to thirdman, was trying to play it  fine down the leg side.
super delivery, full and right in the block-hole, Mortaza makes room and looks to play through the off side, misses it and the ball knocks the base of the off stump.
slower delivery, pushes to the off side.
tucks it through square leg to the deep for a single.

inn2.comm: good length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
a firm drive to cover.
short and wide outside the off stump, Butt cuts it hard to the point boundary.
left alone outside the off stump.
mistimes the cut shot to point.
fuller length delivery pitches outside the off stump and moves away, Butt goes for the drive and gets beaten and through to Dhiman Ghosh, loud appeal for caught behind turned down.
pushes to the off side for a quick single.
fuller and on the pads, works it away through midwicket to the deep.
driven to mid-on.
fuller delivery on middle and leg, flicks it in the air to square leg boundary.
another boundary, good shot driven on up in the air over mid-off to the fence.
driven to mid-on.
back of a length delivery and Butt moves back and punches in the gap between extra cover and mid-off to the fence.
cuts it down to thirdman for a single.
plays it down to thirdman once again for another single.
good length delivery defended to short cover.
short ball and Butt pulls well to the midwicket fence, Butt has been aggressive.
the ball strikes the pad, a loud appeal turned down as the ball pitched outside the leg stump.
fuller delivery worked nicely through midwicket to the deep.
off the pad the ball goes to fine leg fence.
driven down the ground to long off.
good shot, drives inside-out over extra cover to the fence.
full toss driven down the ground to long off.
good length delivery defended to cover.
plays to the onside.
pushed back to the bowler.
dropped! down the wicket and Jamshed drives in the air back to Razzak, who drops a tough chance.
quicker delivery from Razzak, slices to gully.
works it through midwicket to the deep.
swept to long leg for a single.
pushed down the ground to long on.
pushes to cover.
plays to the off side.
pushes in the gap through cover for a single.
defended to the off side.
defended once again.
short ball, goes for the pull and misses.
turns it away to long leg for a single.
swept to short fine leg.
on the leg stump, works it behind square leg for a single.
pushed back to the bowler.
worked to the onside to short midwicket.
driven down the ground to long on.
bowled! Tossed up delivery on the middle stump, Jamshed goes for a big shot on the onside, misses the line and the ball knocks back the stumps.
quicker delivery played back to the bowler.
pushes square of the wicket on the off side.
turns it to short midwicket.
turns it to long leg for a single.
fuller length delivery driven to point.
good ball in the block-hole, dug out to the off side for a single.
fuller delivery outside the off stump, drives well through covers and the sweeper cannot get across to field the ball, goes to the fence.
driven firmly to cover but cannot find the gap.
yorker length delivery dug out to the off side for a single.
short in length outside the off stump, goes for the cut and gets a bottom edge past the stumps to the keeper.
turned to midwicket.
turns it through midwicket to the deep.
played to the off side.
spins down the leg side, signaled a wide.
pushes to cover for a quick single.
sweeps well down to fine leg for couple of runs.
on the middle and leg, worked nicely through midwicket to the deep.
fuller delivery driven to extra cover.
another full delivery outside the off stump, driven to cover.
short and wide outside the off stump, cut to the sweeper cover for a single.
driven down the ground to long off for a single.
cut to the off side.
off the pad to short fine leg, they scamper through for a leg bye.
back of a length delivery worked to deep-square leg.
driven back to the bowler, good diving stop, almost ran out Salman Butt.
cuts it down wide of thirdman for couple of runs.
good strike this, swings it high and over the midwicket fence for maximum.
turns it to fine leg for a single.
arm ball pushed down the ground to long on.
good shot, plays an inside-out shot through extra cover to the fence.
slower delivery, pushes through the off side for a single.
bowled! Full delivery on the leg stump and Younis Khan moves too far across and misses the delivery, the ball knocks back the leg stump.
driven down the ground to long on.
another fuller delivery, driven down the ground to long off.
driven once again down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long off.
good shot driven on the up over the bowler to the long off fence.
off the pads to the onside.
driven through the off side to the sweeper cover for a single.
worked to the onside, Yousuf wanted a single, Butt sends him back.
full toss worked to long leg for couple of runs.
plays and misses a low full toss outside the off stump.
good shot from Yousuf, drives well square of the wicket on the off side to the point boundary.
driven through point for a single.
off the pad to the onside.
goes for a drive through the off side and misses.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
defended to the off side.
swept to long leg for a single.
works it to long leg for a single.
swept nicely to deep-square leg.
cut to sweeper cover for a single.
short from Shakib, goes back and pulls well to midwicket fence, good shot.
looking to work it to the onside, gets a leading edge to the off side.
turns it around to long leg for a single.
driven down the ground to long on.
cut to the off side.
tosses it up and Yousuf drives it well through extra cover to the fence. That is 9000 ODI runs for Yousuf.
turned to midwicket for a single.
worked through the onside for couple of runs.
driven through cover for a single.
punches it down the ground to long off for a single, brings up his 50! Huge roars from the crowd.
inside edge down to fine leg for couple of runs.
worked to midwicket for a single.
good shot, sweeps well in the gap between the long leg and square leg to the fence.
full delivery outside the off stump, plays across the line, off the pad to the onside for a leg bye.
works it through midwicket to the deep.
punches it to cover.
pulls it well to long leg for a single.
driven firmly back to the bowler.
pushed to cover for a single.
pushes it back to the bowler.
driven to cover.
fuller delivery outside the off stump, driven once again to cover.
goes for the big shot, picks it up nicely and lofts it high and over long off fence for maximum.
pushed back to the bowler.
works it to long leg for a single.
cuts and misses outside the off stump.
fuller delivery driven to cover.
yorker length delivery squeezed out to gully.
worked to midwicket.
played through the onside, short midwicket gets an hand to it.
pushed through the off side for a single.
driven to cover.
quicker delivery driven down the ground to long on for a single.
cut to the sweeper cover for a single.
turned to midwicket.
played to the onside.
sweeps it well down to fine leg fence.
pushed to cover.
opens the face off the bat and plays to thirdman.
lovely shot from Butt, drives it well through midwicket to the fence.
comes forward and defends back to the bowler.
run out! Fuller delivery driven to cover, Ashraful makes a good diving stop, both the batsmen are in the middle of the pitch, Ashraful picks up the ball and scores a direct hit to run out Butt.
Malik gets off the mark in style, cuts hard behind point to the fence.
pushed to the off side.
quicker delivery pushed to cover.
That's it Pakistan win. Razzak fires one down the leg side and Dhiman Ghosh cannot collect it, goes to the fence, signaled wides.
